医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
树突状细胞被发现可以杀死缺乏 CD47 的 T 细胞神户大学的研究人员发现了一种全新的、意想不到的机制，通过这种机制，免疫系统可以清除缺乏将其识别为小鼠自身一部分的分子的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Dendritic-cells-found-to-kill-CD47-deficient-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Dendritic-cells-found-to-kill-CD47-deficient-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d7cad80-687d-4e40-99d1-56aadd5676aa Tue, 08 Aug 2023 15:35:25 -0400 Dendritic cells found to kill CD47-deficient T cells
新型神经调节方法可改善帕金森病患者的步态步态相关障碍会对帕金森病 (PD) 患者的生活质量产生不利影响，这种疾病影响着全球数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Novel-neuromodulation-approach-leads-to-gait-improvements-in-病人-with-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Novel-neuromodulation-approach-leads-to-gait-improvements-in-病人-with-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc51f6a6-e003-4834-b811-39c00746cec6 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 15:28:10 -0400 Novel neuromodulation approach leads to gait improvements in patients with Parkinson’s disease
研究人员发现了类多发性硬化症自身免疫性疾病可能的新生物标志物多年来，人们都知道“多发性硬化症”的诊断掩盖了一系列不同的疾病，每种疾病都需要定制治疗。巴塞尔大学和巴塞尔大学医院的研究人员现在描述了一种可能的新的多发性硬化症样疾病，并解释了如何诊断它。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Researchers-discover-possible-new-biomarker-of-MS-like-autoimmune-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Researchers-discover-possible-new-biomarker-of-MS-like-autoimmune-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5eba9d81-60d1-4ec8-a96f-5b7895c6f2f9 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 15:23:21 -0400 Researchers discover possible new biomarker of MS-like autoimmune disease
机器学习模型发现乳房致密女性的新乳腺癌风险指标根据北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《放射学》上发表的一项研究，机器学习模型发现，乳房 MRI 的背景实质增强 (BPE) 是乳房密度极高的女性患乳腺癌风险的指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Machine-learning-model-finds-new-breast-cancer-risk-indicator-in-women-with-dense-breasts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Machine-learning-model-finds-new-breast-cancer-risk-indicator-in-women-with-dense-breasts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eca36d01-8eb4-437d-ba7b-d6bb3b2275ae Tue, 08 Aug 2023 15:15:21 -0400 Machine learning model finds new breast cancer risk indicator in women with dense breasts
无线脑电图耳机可以实现家庭中风康复对于美国每年有 795,000 名中风患者来说，在家中中风康复的世界越来越近，令人难以置信的消息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Wireless-EEG-headset-could-enable-at-home-中风-rehabilitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Wireless-EEG-headset-could-enable-at-home-中风-rehabilitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=027f474e-17d5-4088-aa6b-a3538b83df15 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 14:56:28 -0400 Wireless EEG headset could enable at-home stroke rehabilitation
MINDWATCH 技术揭示日常乐趣如何增强脑力听音乐和喝咖啡是一种日常乐趣，可以影响人的大脑活动，从而提高认知能力，包括需要集中注意力和记忆力的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/MINDWATCH-technology-reveals-how-everyday-pleasures-can-boost-brain-power.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/MINDWATCH-technology-reveals-how-everyday-pleasures-can-boost-brain-power.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7db9ecd1-b2fd-4c5e-887c-43cec53b9335 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 14:37:38 -0400 MINDWATCH technology reveals how everyday pleasures can boost brain power
全国儿童医院开创了杜氏肌营养不良症的新基因疗法对于全国儿童医院阿比盖尔韦克斯纳研究所来说，这是一个具有里程碑意义的时刻，一名来自俄亥俄州贝尔方丹的 5 岁儿童在全国儿童医院接受了第一剂最近批准的治疗杜氏肌营养不良症的基因疗法，该疗法是在该医院发明的，初步测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Nationwide-Childrens-Hospital-pioneers-new-gene-therapy-for-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Nationwide-Childrens-Hospital-pioneers-new-gene-therapy-for-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a83a3f8a-e827-4d25-9d93-282048e13458 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 14:19:21 -0400 Nationwide Children's Hospital pioneers new gene therapy for Duchenne muscular dystrophy
研究发现迷幻药物会导致大鼠脑电波同步隆德大学的研究人员开发了一种技术，可以同时测量清醒大鼠大脑 128 个区域的电信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Psychedelic-drugs-cause-synchronized-brain-waves-in-rats-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Psychedelic-drugs-cause-synchronized-brain-waves-in-rats-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=718acf7b-264f-40c9-a6d5-5b12fe2ceb66 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 14:09:59 -0400 Psychedelic drugs cause synchronized brain waves in rats, study finds
RAGE 在侵袭性三阴性乳腺癌的可塑性细胞机制中发挥关键作用由 Vall d'Hebron 肿瘤研究所 (VHIO) 研究员 Josep Villanueva 领导的一项研究在《Oncogene》杂志上在线发表，该研究表明晚期糖基化终产物 (RAGE) 受体在间充质三阴性乳腺癌（TNBC）中可塑性的细胞机制，将上皮细胞转化为间充质细胞，作为癌细胞增殖和肿瘤侵袭的有效驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/RAGE-plays-key-role-in-cellular-mechanisms-of- Plasticity-in-aggressive-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/RAGE-plays-key-role-in-cellular-mechanisms-of- Plasticity-in-aggressive-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81dbc896-c306-4e08-af98-c59cc235d637 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 13:53:11 -0400 RAGE plays key role in cellular mechanisms of plasticity in aggressive triple-negative breast cancer
研究表明细胞色素 P450 酶表现出独特的软机器人特性研究揭示了生命系统中纳米机器领域的一项重要发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Cytochromes-P450-enzymes-exhibit-unique-soft-robotic-properties-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Cytochromes-P450-enzymes-exhibit-unique-soft-robotic-properties-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=334e08de-9a9b-4118-bdf9-4a029e63667b Tue, 08 Aug 2023 13:15:13 -0400 Cytochromes P450 enzymes exhibit unique soft-robotic properties, study reveals
